bancaDoIngresso.title: Banca do ingresso Admin Dashboard
bancaDoIngresso.description: The 'Banca do Ingresso' project, is a system for manage event tickets. The admin dashboard is a web application that allows the management of events, tickets and users. The system was developed using react and typescript.

playx1.title: PlayX1
playx1.description: The PlayX1 is a project of a platform for betting on online games. The project was developed using ReactJS, NextJS, Typescript
